docs.summary: Read and manage catalogs

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the menu belongs to.

params.name: menuId
params.doc: Menu ID.

docs.summary: Archives a menu. You can't update archived menus.

examples.title: Archive Menu

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the menus belong to.

params.name: ids
params.doc: IDs of the menus to archive.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full menu entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Changes the `archived` boolean to `true` for multiple menus in a draft catalog.

examples.title: Bulk Archive Menus

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the dishes will belong to.

params.name: createDishRequests
params.doc: Information about the dishes to create. Limited to 20 dishes.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full item entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Adds multiple dishes to a draft catalog.

examples.title: Bulk Create Dishes

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the menus will belong to.

params.name: menus
params.doc: Information about the menus to create. Limited to 20 menus.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full menu entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Adds multiple menus to a draft catalog.

examples.title: Bulk Create Menus

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the sections will belong to.

params.name: createSectionRequests
params.doc: Information about the sections to create. Limited to 20 sections.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full section entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Adds multiple sections to a draft catalog.

examples.title: Bulk Create Sections

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the variations will belong to.

params.name: variations
params.doc: Variations to create. Limited to 20 variations.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full variation entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Adds multiple variations to a draft catalog.

examples.title: Bulk Create Variations

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the menus belong to.

params.name: ids
params.doc: IDs of the menus to unarchive.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full menu entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Changes the `archived` boolean to `false` for multiple menus in a draft catalog.

examples.title: Bulk Unarchive Menus

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the items belong to.

params.name: items
params.doc: Items to update. Limited to 20 items.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full item entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary:
Updates multiple items in a draft catalog.
You can't update archived items.

examples.title: Bulk Update Items

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the menus belong to.

params.name: menus
params.doc: Menus to update.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full menu entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary:
Updates multiple menus in a draft catalog. 
You can't update archived menus.

examples.title: Bulk Update Menus

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the sections belong to.

params.name: updateSectionsRequests
params.doc: Information about the sections to update. Limited to 20 sections.

params.name: returnFullEntity
params.doc: Whether the full section entity is returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary:
Updates multiple sections in a draft catalog. 
You can't update archived sections.

examples.title: Bulk Update Sections

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the discount belongs to.

params.name: discount
params.doc: Discount to create.

docs.summary:
Creates a discount. 
You can create discounts for catalogs, sections, or dishes. You can't create a discount that applies to a menu.

examples.title: Create Discount

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the dish will belong to.

params.name: menuId
params.doc: ID of the menu the dish will belong to.

params.name: sectionId
params.doc: ID of the section the dish will belong to.

params.name: dish
params.doc: Item of type `dish` to create.

docs.summary: Creates a dish.

examples.title: Create Dish

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog to create a draft version for.

docs.summary:
Creates a draft version of the specified catalog. 
Then you can update and publish the draft catalog by using the endpoints in the [Draft Catalogs category](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/draft-catalogs).

> **Note:** You can't create more than one draft catalog per location.

examples.title: Create Draft Catalog

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the menu will belong to.

params.name: menu
params.doc: Menu to create.

docs.summary: Creates a menu.

examples.title: Create Menu

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the section will belong to.

params.name: menuId
params.doc: ID of the menu the section will belong to.

params.name: section
params.doc: Section to create.

docs.summary:
Creates a section. 
You can't add the section to multiple menus, since every section belongs to a single menu.

examples.title: Create Section

{"section": {
  "id": "dd53b918-76ed-11ec-90d6-0242ac120003",

    ],

      "MOBILE_SITE",
      "SITE"
    ],

  },
  "archived": false
}}

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the variation will belong to.

params.name: name
params.doc: Variation name.

docs.summary: Creates a variation.

examples.title: Create Variation
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/restaurants/v3/catalogs/4d088f16-d341-44b2-ac69-ae8f3e8897fd/variations' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    --data-raw '{
       "name": "Mixed sliced mushrooms and garlic"
    }'
response:
{"variation": {
  "id": "1a4a1fd0-3029-46df-819b-e3d22dabb5aa",
  "name": "Mixed sliced mushrooms and garlic",
  "description": null,
  "price":   {
    "value": "0.00",
    "currency": "USD"
  },
  "imageUrl": null,
  "labels": null,
  "inStock": true,
  "archived": true,
  "visibilityCriteria":   {
    "visible": true,
    "fulfillmentTypes":     [
      "DELIVERY",
      "PICKUP_OR_DINE_IN"
    ],
    "platforms":     [
      "SITE",
      "MOBILE_SITE",
      "WIX_APP",
      "CALL_CENTER",
      "CHAT_BOT"
    ],
    "availability": null
  },
  "dishOptions": null,
  "taxRate": "0.00",
  "acceptSpecialRequest": true,
  "type": "VARIATION"
}}

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the draft catalog to discard.

docs.summary: Discards a draft catalog. If you want to continue using [Bulk endpoints](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/draft-catalogs) for this catalog, you must first call the [Create Draft Catalog](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/draft-catalogs/create-draft-catalog) endpoint again.

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

permissions.name: Read Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: sort.fieldName
params.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

params.name: sort.order
params.doc: Sort order.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc: Number of items to load.

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: archived
params.doc: Whether archived catalogs are returned. Defaults to `false`.

params.name: locationIds
params.doc: IDs of the locations for which the catalog will be returned. See the [Locations API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/business-info/locations/introduction) for more details.

docs.summary:
Retrieves catalogs, given the provided filtering, sorting and paging. 
Note that there is a single catalog per location.

examples.title: List Catalogs

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: fieldMask.paths

params.name: active
params.doc: Whether only active discounts are returned. Defaults to `true`.

docs.summary: Retrieves up to 1000 discounts.

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the draft catalog to publish.

docs.summary: Publishes a draft catalog to the live site by replacing the existing catalog.

examples.title: Publish Draft Catalog

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: menuId

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: discount.id
params.doc: Discount ID.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the discount belongs to.

params.name: discount
params.doc: Discount to update.

docs.summary:
Updates a discount. 
A discount can belong to a catalog, section, or dish. You can't create a discount that applies to a menu.

examples.title: Update Discount

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: item.id
params.doc: Item ID.

params.name: catalogId

params.name: item
params.doc: Item to update.

docs.summary:
Updates an item.
You can't update archived items.

examples.title: Update Item

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: menu.id
params.doc: Menu ID.

params.name: catalogId

params.name: menu
params.doc: Menu to update.

Updates a menu.
You can't update archived menus.

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

params.name: section.id
params.doc: Section ID.

params.name: catalogId
params.doc: ID of the catalog the section belongs to.

params.name: menuId
params.doc: Menu ID.

params.name: section
params.doc: Section to update.

docs.summary:
Updates a section. 
You can't update archived sections. Note that every section belongs to a single menu, you can't add it to another menu.

examples.title: Create Section

docs.summary:
Triggered when a catalog is created.

> __Note:__ The webhook doesn't return information about the entities belonging to the catalog. You may need to create your own logic to retrieve the catalog's content.

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

permissions.name: Read Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's restaurant catalogs.

docs.summary:
Triggered when a catalog is changed.

> __Note:__ The webhook doesn't return information about what has changed. In order to update an external POS upon changes to a Wix Restaurants catalog you may need to create your own logic to identify the changes.

permissions.name: Manage Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's restaurant catalogs.

permissions.name: Read Restaurant Catalogs
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's restaurant catalogs.

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.restaurants.catalogs.v3.catalog`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `created`.
Event name.

members.name: createdEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Catalog ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: entity
members.doc: Event body

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.restaurants.catalogs.v3.catalog`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `updated`.
Event name.

members.name: updatedEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Catalog ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.restaurants.catalogs.v3.catalog`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `catalog_changed`.
Event name.

members.name: actionEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: CatalogChanged ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: body
members.doc: Event body

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was successful

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: For how many items the requested action was not successful

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: total number of failures without details because detailed-failure-threshold exceeded

members.name: id
members.doc: Item id. Should always be provided, unless it's impossible (e.g when failing to create an item)

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: The index of the item within the request array to allow the caller to correlate the request and response items

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the action requested was successful for this item. When this value is false, error should be populated

members.name: error
members.doc: In case of failure, details about the error

members.name: visible
members.doc:
Whether the entity appears in the live site. Defaults to `true`. 
If `false`, the entity isn't rendered in the live site, even if each visibility criterion is fulfilled.

members.name: fulfillmentTypes
members.doc: Fulfillment types.

members.name: platforms
members.doc: Ordering platforms.

members.name: availability
members.doc: Time periods when the entity is available.

members.name: periods
members.doc:
Weekly recurring time periods when the entity is available. 
Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriods
members.doc: Exceptions to the entity's regular availability. The entity can be available or not available during the special hour period.

docs.summary: Weekly recurring time periods when the entity is available.

members.name: openDay
members.doc: Day of the week the period starts on.

members.name: openTime
members.doc:
Time the period starts in 24-hour [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format. Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day.

members.name: closeDay
members.doc: Day of the week the period ends on.

members.name: closeTime
members.doc:
Time the period ends in 24-hour [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) extended format. Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day. 
__Note:__ If `openDay` and `closeDay` specify the same day of the week `closeTime` must be later than `openTime`.

docs.summary: Exception to the business's regular hours. The business can be open or closed during the exception.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Start date and time of the exception in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format and [Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coordinated_Universal_Time).

members.name: endDate
members.doc: End date and time of the exception in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format and [Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coordinated_Universal_Time).

members.name: available
members.doc: Whether the item is available during the exception. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: eventName
members.doc: Name of the special hour period. In the Business Manager the special hour period is called event.

docs.summary:
Money.
 Default format to use. Sufficiently compliant with majority of standards: w3c, ISO 4217, ISO 20022, ISO 8583:2003.

members.name: value
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string with a period as a decimal separator (e.g., 3.99). Optionally, a single (-), to indicate that the amount is negative.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency code. Must be valid ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., USD).

docs.summary:
Anything that customers can buy in the restaurant. Items can be of type `DISH` or `VARIATION`.
You can read more about items in the [introduction](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/introduction).

members.name: id
members.doc: Item ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Item name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Item description.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price.

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: URL of the item's image file.

members.name: labels
members.doc: Item labels. For example spicy, hot, vegan, gluten-free, or organic.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the item is in stock.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate of the item in percent.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether the item is archived. Defaults to `false`. **Note:** Archived items can't be updated.

members.name: visibilityCriteria
members.doc:
Visibility criteria that must be met for the item to appear in the live site.
In case of multiple visibility criteria, every criterion must be fulfilled.

members.name: dishOptions
members.doc: Items customers can choose to modify a dish. Can be an extra, selection, or deselection.

members.name: acceptSpecialRequest
members.doc: Whether a customer can add a special request when ordering this item. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: type
members.doc: Item type.

members.name: defaultChoice
members.doc: Item ID of the default choice.

members.name: availableChoices
members.doc:
Item IDs of the available choices.
[(wix.api.minSize) = 1]

members.name: defaultChoices
members.doc: Item IDs of the default choices.

members.name: minChoices
members.doc: Minimum number of extras a customer must choose. Defaults to `0`. Must be lower than or equal to the value of `availableChoices`.

members.name: maxChoices
members.doc: Maximum number of extras a customer can choose. Defaults to the value of `availableChoices`. Must be greater than or equal to the value of `minChoices`.

members.name: availableChoices
members.doc:
Item IDs of the available choices.
[(wix.api.minSize) = 1]

members.name: availableChoices
members.doc:
Item IDs of the available choices.
[(wix.api.minSize) = 1]

members.name: itemId
members.doc: Item ID of the dish option.

members.name: price
members.doc: Dish option price. `0` for free choices that are included in the dish's price.

members.name: name
members.doc: Dish option name.

members.name: selection
members.doc: Item of type `DISH` or `VARIATION` that customers can select. For example a dish size. Customers can choose only a single selection per dish.

members.name: extras
members.doc: Item of type `DISH` or `VARIATION` that customers can add to a dish. For example a topping. Customers can add multiple extras per dish.

members.name: deselection
members.doc: Item of type `DISH` or `VARIATION` that customers can remove from a dish. For example a specific ingredient. Customers can remove multiple deselections per dish.

docs.summary:
Collection of sections that show what customers can buy in the restaurant. 
You can read more about menus in the [introduction](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/introduction).

members.name: id
members.doc: Menu ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Menu name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Menu description.

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: URL of the menu's image file.

members.name: visibilityCriteria
members.doc:
Visibility criteria that must be met for the menu to appear in the live site.
In case of multiple visibility criteria, every criterion must be fulfilled.

members.name: sectionIds
members.doc: IDs of the sections that are included in the menu.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether the menu is archived. Defaults to `false`. **Note:** Archived menus can't be updated.

docs.summary: Item IDs of the dishes that belong to this section.

Collection of dishes that customers can buy in the restaurant. 
You can read more about sections in the [introduction](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/introduction).

members.doc: URL of the section's image file.

members.name: itemIds
members.doc: IDs of the items that belong to the section.

members.name: visibilityCriteria
members.doc:
Visibility criteria that must be met for the section to appear in the live site.
In case of multiple visibility criteria, every criterion must be fulfilled.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether the section is archived. Defaults to `false`. **Note:** Archived sections can't be updated.

docs.summary:
Collection of menus and discounts available in a specific location. 
Use a [draft catalog](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/draft-catalogs) to publish multiple changes to a catalog at the same time. 
You can read more about catalogs in the [introduction](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-restaurants/catalogs/introduction).

members.name: id
members.doc: Catalog ID.

members.name: locationId
members.doc: ID of the location the catalog belongs to. See the [Locations API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/business-info/locations/introduction) for more details.

members.name: archived
members.doc:
Whether the catalog is archived. 
__Note:__ Archived catalogs can't be updated.

members.name: draftPublishedDate
members.doc: Date and time the last time a draft catalog has been published in `yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:sssZ` format and [Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coordinated_Universal_Time).

members.name: id
members.doc: Discount ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Discount name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Discount description.

members.name: active
members.doc: Whether the discount is active. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: type
members.doc: Discount type.

members.name: condition
members.doc:
Discount condition. 
All conditions must be met so that a customer can apply the discount.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount amount.

members.name: percentage
members.doc: Discount percentage.

members.name: sectionIds
members.doc: IDs of the sections the discount applies to.

members.name: itemIds
members.doc: IDs of the items the discount applies to. **Note:** The items must be of type `dish`.

members.name: fulfillmentTypes
members.doc: Which fulfillment types the discount applies to.

members.name: platforms
members.doc: Which ordering platforms the discount applies to.

members.name: availability
members.doc: List of times when the discount is available.

members.name: minOrderPrice
members.doc: Minimum order price for the discount.

members.name: coupon
members.doc: Coupon associated with the discount.

members.name: applied
members.doc: Whether the customer needs to enter the coupon code to receive the discount. Defaults to `true`.

members.name: code
members.doc: Coupon code.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: catalogId
members.doc: ID of the catalog the menu belongs to.

members.name: menuId
members.doc: Menu ID.

members.doc: ID of the catalog the section belongs to.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_FULFILLMENT_TYPE
  • DELIVERY
  • PICKUP_OR_DINE_IN

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_PLATFORM
  • SITE
  • MOBILE_SITE
  • WIX_APP
  • CALL_CENTER
  • CHAT_BOT

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • SUN
  • MON
  • TUE
  • WED
  • THU
  • FRI
  • SAT

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_ITEM_TYPE
  • DISH
  • VARIATION

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_DISH_OPTION_TYPE
  • SELECTION
  • EXTRAS
  • DESELECTION

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_TYPE
  • OFF_ITEM
  • OFF_ORDER

Possible values are:
  • UNSPECIFIED_PLATFORM
  • SITE
  • MOBILE_SITE
  • CALL_CENTER

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC
